trans-unit.source: "Accessible Books" are books that work well for people with impaired vision. With the ePUB format*, it is possible to make "Born Accessible" books that work well for everyone**, regardless of vision. Bloom has the following tools to help you create these books:
trans-unit.note: The * and ** are footnote markers that should remain the same.
trans-unit.target: "Qe' u'j at amb'il tu'n kykanet" b'ananmajqe kye xjal nti' nchi ka'yin. Tu'n tumlal ePUB* b'a'n tu'n kyb'antqe "At amb'il tu'n kykanetqa kyb'antlenqexix" ex nchi ajb'enqe tuj tu'melxix tu'n kykyaqil**, qa b'a'n mo mi b'an ka'yin. Tuj Bloom ate' txqantl makb'il nchi onin tu'n kyb'ant u'j lu':

alt-trans.target: "U'j at amb'il tu'n kykanetqa" b'ananmajqe kye xjal nti' nchi ke'yin. Tu'n tumala ePUB* b'a'n tu'n kyb'antqe "At amb'il tu'n kykanetqa b'antlenqexix" ex nchajb'enqe tuj tu'melxix tu'n kyaqil**, qa b'a'n mo mib'an ke'yin. Tuj Bloom ate' qe txqantl makb'il nchi onin tu'n kyb'ant qe u'j lu':

trans-unit.source: This tool, the Accessibility Checker, has:
trans-unit.target: Tuj makb'il lu', "Ke'yb'il tumlal te qokix" at:

trans-unit.source: The "Accessibility Checklist" which is where Bloom checks over your book and points you to anything that needs attention, especially for speakers of minority languages.
trans-unit.target: Aj "Ttxolil ka'yb'il tumlal" najb'lan tu'n Bloom tu'n tb'aj xpich'it u'j ex ntzaj tyek'in nokx alkye ti'chaq, kyexix qe yol nya' nimxix xjal nchi yolin ti'j.

alt-trans.target: Aj "Txolil ke'yb'il tumlal" najb'lan tu'n Bloom tu'n tb'aj xpich'an tu'jil ex ntzaj tyek'in nokx alkye ti'chaq, kyexix qe yolb'il nya' nimxix xjal nchi yolin ti'j.

trans-unit.source: The "Ace by DAISY Checker" searches the actual ePUB generated by Bloom looking for any problems.
trans-unit.target: A ka'yb'il "Ace by Daisy Checker" nb'aj xpich'ante k'ub'il tu'mel aq'untl ePUB b'incha'n maj tu'n Bloom tu'n tjyet il.

alt-trans.target: A ke'yb'il "Ace by Daisy Checker" nb'aj xpich'an k'ub'il tu'mel aq'untl ePUB b'incha'n maj tu'n Bloom tu'n tjyet il.

trans-unit.source: While the ideal is that a single book can serve everyone, the ePUB standard and ePUB readers do not actually support that. They currently only work for blind people who speak a language that is supported by "Text to Speech" (TTS) systems. At this time, TTS is only available for large or commercially interesting languages. Until the standard and accessible readers improve, it is necessary to make special versions of accessible books for minority language speakers. For blind readers to hear the image descriptions, we need to put something special on the page. In this version of Bloom, you do this by clicking the "Include image descriptions on page" checkbox in the Publish:ePUB screen. Future versions may have other options in this area.
trans-unit.target: Kuchiwit kub' b'inchet jun u'j tu'n tajb'en qe qkyaqil. Naqtzun aju, ja'lo nlayx b'ant tb'inchet tu'n tumlal aq'untl ePUB ex qe sch'ib'il ePUB. In aq'unan o'kx kye xjal mi b'a'n chi ka'yin o'nanqe' kyu'nqe' aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' "Text to Speech" (TTS) mo "Tz'ib'an maj tu'n qb'in". Ja'lo a te TTS n-ajb'en kyu'n qe' yol nchi yolijtz kyu'n nim xjal. Max okxa chi b'antxix tumlal aq'untl ex qe sch'ib'il ePUB, ilx ti'j tu'n tkub' b'inchet ak'aj tumlal u'j te kykyaqil qe' xjal nchi yolin yol ch'inx kynaj. Tu'ntzan kyb'in b'ib'itz tib'aj ju'njun tilb'ilal kyu'n qe xjal mib'an chi ke'yin, ilx ti'j tu'n tku'x jun tumlal b'a'nxix tuj yek'b'il aq'untl. Tuj tu'mel aq'untl te Bloom b'a'n tu'n tkub' b'inchet qa ma txi' tq'o'na jun clik jatuma ntma'n "Tqanil tib'aj tilb'ilal tuj yek'b'il aq'untl" twitz ka'yb'il kelex q'amet:ePUB. Ok okel txqantl tumlal aq'untl tuj tq'ab' aq'untl lu'.

alt-trans.target: Tuj tu'melxix qa tu'n tkub' b'inchet jun u'j tu'n tajb'en te kyaqil. Ja'lo nlayx kub' b'inchet tu'n tumlal aq'untl ePUB ex qe sch'ib'il ePUB. B'a'n tz'aq'unan o'kx kye xjal mib'an chi ke'yin o'nanqe kyu'nqe yek'b'il tumlal aq'untl "Text to Speech" (TTS) mo "Tz'ib'an maj tu'n qb'in". Ja'lo a te TTS nokx tuj ju'njun qe yolb'il nchi yolijtz kyu'n nim xjal b'a'n tu'n taq'unanjs. Max okxa chi b'antxix tumlal aq'untl ex qe sch'ib'il ePUB, ilx ti'j tu'n tkub' b'inchet ak'aj tumlal u'j te kykyaqil qe xjal nchi yolin qe yolb'il ch'ix chi naj. Tu'ntzan kyb'in b'ib'itz tib'aj ju'njun tib'lal kyu'n qe xjal mib'an chi ke'yin, ilx ti'j tu'n tku'x jun tumlal b'a'nxix tuj yek'b'il aq'untl. Tuj tu'mel aq'untl te Bloom b'a'n tu'n tkub' b'inchet qa ma t-xi' tq'o'na jun clik jatuma ntma'n "B'ib'itz tib'aj tib'lal tuj yek'b'il aq'untl" twitz ke'yb'il kelex q'amet:ePUB. Ok qoqel txqantl tumlal aq'untl tuj tq'ab' aq'untl lu'.

trans-unit.source: Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.

trans-unit.source:
The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file. JPEG files are perfect for photographs and color artwork. However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art. Problems include:
• Fuzziness and grey dots.
• Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
• If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.

Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse. If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:
trans-unit.target:
JPEG jun aq'unb'il ma jaw sak'et. Aqetzun nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG tb'anil kye uk'sa'n ilb'ilalb'aj. Naqtzun aju' mya' b'a'n kye ilb'ilalb'aj mya' uk'sa'nqe. Aqetzan mya' b'a'n ntzaj tq'o'n lu':
• mixtixix q'ancha'l ex saqinin kye'yin.
• nim talil, qu'mtzun kuw tu'n tb'ant tsipit u'jb'il.
• Qa nim qe nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG matijxix at, b'ala mlay ku'xb'aj toj tk'ub'il Bloom tu'n tkub' tb'incha'n PDFs.

 Tqanil: Tu'n tlaj aju JPEG "nokx nkub' yajit", qa ma meltz'et jun nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG tu'n tok te PNG, TIFF mo BMP mya' b'an in chi b'anta'. Qa ajunak'ub'il aq'untl lu' jun aq'untl tuj saq es q'eq, il ti'j tu'n tjaw jun tilb'ilal tujxix jatum ne'l i'tz'a' toj qe ju'n tumlal aq'untl.

 B'inchama xtalb'il sak'onkytza jun kyxol lu', ex q'onkub'a klik tib'aj "K'amol":

alt-trans.target:
Aju nak'ub'il aq'unb'il ma' b'aj sak'et atzun nak'ub'il te "JPEG". Qe nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG b'a'nxixqe tu'n tel tilb'ilal ex qe tilb'il tok kyk'a'. Ax ikyx ntzaj tq'o'n nya' b'a'n qa ma tz'ok aq'net o'k x tuj saq ex q'eq. Aqetzan nya' b'a'n ntzaj tq'o'n lu':
• muj tilb'il ex txut tza'j kye'yin.
• Nak'ub'il aq'unb'il mati'jxix, nti' ntzaj tq'o'n tu'n tb'aj sipit u'jb'il.
• Qa nim qe nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG matijxix at, b'ala nlayx kux b'aj tuj tkub'il Bloom, tu'n tkub' tb'incha'n PDFs.

 Tqanil: Tu'n tlaj tumlal aq'untl JPEG "nokx nkub' yajit", qa ma meltz'et jun nak'ub'il aq'unb'il JPEG tu'n tok te PNG, TIFF mo BMP nti'x tu'n tb'antxix. Qa jun nak'ub'il aq'unb'il lu' jun aq'untl tuj saq es q'eq, il ti'j tu'n tjaw jun tilb'ilal tujxix jatum ne'l i'tz'aj tuj qe ju'n tumlal aq'untl.

 B'inchama xtalb'il sak'on jaw jun txol txqantl, ex b'inchanxa clic tib'aj "K'amol":
Poqb'al ilx ti'j tu'n t-xi' qb'i'n te JPEG

alt-trans.target: B'a'n tajb'en qe ttenb'il lu' tu'n t-xi' tb'inchan Bloom jun noqxix ten ti'j tza'n qoqil kyke'yin qe tilb'ilal qe xjal nya' tuj tu'mel nchi ka'yin.

trans-unit.source: Motion Books are Bloom Reader books with two modes. Normally, they are Talking Books. When you turn the phone sideways, the picture fills the screen. It pans and zooms from rectangle "1" to rectangle "2".
trans-unit.target: Qe u'jb'il nchi yukẍ te Bloom Reader tuk'il kab' tumel. Aqe' Q'ojq'oju'j. Aj tjaw tsutyana t-xk'utz'ib'a ma qa tyolb'ila in jaw ch'iy tilb'il. In yukch ti'j swej "1" ex npon tilb'il ti'j swejin "2".

alt-trans.target: Qe u'jb'il nchi yukẍ te Bloom Reader atzan qe u'jb'il te kab'e tu'mel. Aqe Q'ojq'ojelu'j. Ok tyukẍ makb'il aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' mo k'uxb'il te yolb'il, ate tilb'ilal ntzaj tyek'an tuj kyaqil tilb'il. N-yukẍ ti'j swejin "1" ex npon tilb'il ti'j swejin "2".

trans-unit.source: Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, then ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed, which may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.note: OLD TEXT (before 3.9, shorter wording): Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Nti' ma b'ant t-xi qe HTTP Listener te Bloom, najb'en tu'n tyolin ex tyikchet tanmi tuk'il Firefox. Qa ma b'aj lu' extzun axtaq ma jaw ttxaqo'na xk'utz'ib'. inti'j tu'n t-xi' tka'yina qa nti' juntl maqb'il aq'untl jaqu'n toj. Qa ikyju' ilti'j tu'n tkub' yupit aju maqb'il aq'untl txaq'on toj lu' tu'ntzun tb'ent taq'unan Bloom.

alt-trans.target: Nti' ma b'ant txi qe' teklx HTTP Listener te Bloom, najb'en tu'n tyolin tuk' jyetb'il tok ti'j te Firefox. Qa ax jo ma b'aj jutl maj mataq nt-xi' txqona txk'utz'ib'a, il ti'j tu'n txi' tqana tu'n tb'aj xpich'in qa tok jun aq'na'b'il tx'enb'il q'aq' tx'u'j. Jaka b'ant tu'n tel q'it tx'emb'il q'aq' ti'j tu'ntzan tajb'en Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!

trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Mya'l txi' qe' Bloom tuj tumelxix. Aju nb'aj lu' o tz'ok ke'yin kyoj xk'utz'ib' toksa'n ZoneAlarm kyi'j. Tqanil: Qa ma ku'x yupin ZoneAlarm mla'y t-xi' tb'incha'n tib'. Ax qa ma txi' qe' juntl maj tuk'il ttxolil aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' ZoneAlarm yupin maj mla'y t-xi' tb'incha'n tib'. Tu'n t-xi' tb'incha'n tib' il ti'j tu'n tel q'it ZoneAlarm ti'j.

alt-trans.target: Nya' tuj tu'melxix nxi' qe' Bloom. Ajo nb'aj lu' o tz'ok kye'yin kyujqe xk'utz'ib' toksa'n ZoneAlarm kyi'j. Tqanil: Qa ma kux yupin ZoneAlarm nlay t-xi' tb'inchan tib'. Ax qa ma txi' qe' juntl maj tuk' ttxolil aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' ZoneAlarm yupn maj nlay t-xi' tb'inchan tib'. Tu'n t-xi' tb'inchan tib' il ti'j tu'n tel q'it ZoneAlarm ti'j.
Nb'inchet qe ttenb'il b'inchil u'jb'il b'anan maj

trans-unit.source: A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.
trans-unit.target: BloomPDFMaker.exe, jun tzemel te Bloom, noq tzun aju nikuj mixti'. Tu'n tlaj mlayx qil qe' tilb'il na'mxtaq chex ex qe q'ol tilb'ilal. Qe' ttxolil aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' tok te kalo'b'il yab'il ti'j ntzaj tq'o'n lu'. Ja'ka b'ant tu'n tok tke'yan tu'n jun ajbi'nchal ti'j, tu'ntzan t-xi' jiqinin toklen Bloom ex tu'n tkolet nak'ub'il aq'unb'il lu' tu'n min tel.

alt-trans.target: BloomPDFMaker.exe, jun tzemel te Bloom, tzanka mi-a'l at. Tu'n tlaj nlayx qila qe tilb'il na'mxtaq chex ex qe q'ol tilb'ilal. Qe ttxolil aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' tok te kalo'b'il yab'il ti'j ntzaj tq'o'n jlu'. Jaka b'ant tu'n tok tkye'yan tu'n jun ajbi'nchal ti'j, tu'ntzan txi' jiqinin toklen Bloom ex tu'n tkolet nak'ub'il aq'unb'il lu' tu'n min tel.

trans-unit.source: A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make local language books with your shells.

B'a'n tu'n tok iqit qe u'jb'il b'ananmaj te BloomLibrary.org. Ex b'a'n tu'n kub' b'inchet jun tnej te Bloom tu'n t-xi' samet kye juntl tu'n tkub' kyb'inchin u'jb'il tuj kyex kyol kyu'n qe u'jb'il b'ananmaj kxe'l tb'inchana.

B'a'n tu'n tok iqit qe u'jb'il b'ananmaj te BloomLibrary.org. Ax b'a'n tu'n kub' b'inchet jun tenej te Bloom tu'n t-xi' samet kye juntl tu'n tkub' kyb'inchin u'jb'il tuj kyex kyol kyu'n qe u'jb'il b'ananmaj qxel tb'inchana.

trans-unit.source: Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ma tna' qa ate k'loj te ila' wiq lu' tokx tuj tk'ub'il te Dropbox. lu' ja'ku tzaj tq'o'n nimku mya' b'a'n tu'n tlaj Dropbox nmaqan te Bloom ti'jx tib' te tnak'ub'il. Qa at jun mya' b'a'n kxel qoqxe'na tu'n tyukx tuj juntl tenb'il aj k'loj te ila' wiq mo qa tu'n tel ti'ne Dropbox qa ma tz'ajb'lan Bloom tu'na.

Qa at jun nya' b'a'n kxel qoqxe'na tu'n tyukx tuj juntl tenb'il aj k'loj te ila' wiq mo qa tu'n tel ti'ne Dropbox qa ma tz'ajb'lan Bloom tu'na.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.

Here, the English 'Accessibility' is a common way of refering to technologies that are usable by people with disabilities. With computers, this usually means people with visual impairments. It includes botht he blind and people who might need text to be larger, or who are colorblind, etc.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
trans-unit.target: Okxe'nb'il: Qe' tu'jil amb'il ti'chaq ajb'enil te kyaqil, in taj tu'n tajb'en tu'jb'ila kye junjuntl xjal b'a'nqa min in b'ant kyyolinxi toj tyol tu'jil xkej tq'o'na.

trans-unit.source: This book seems to be a template, that is, it contains blank pages for authoring a new book rather than content to translate into other languages. If that is not what you intended, you should get expert help before uploading this book.\n\nDo you want to go ahead?

Qa n-ya' ajo tajb'ila, ilx ti'j tu'n t-xi' tjyona onb'il kyuk' qe tzqilte nantaq iqet u'jb'il lu'.\n\n¿Tajpiya tu'n tlajet?

trans-unit.source: Bloom already knows which characters in the world's languages always mark the end of sentences. To add others, enter the Unicode character escapes here. For example for Thai script languages, enter \U0020 to tell Bloom that normal spaces are used to break sentences.
trans-unit.target: Ojtzqi'n tu'n Bloom tq'amanjtz junjun techil in ajb'en tujqe' twitz yol te' twitz tx'otx' tu'n tok techil jatumal npon b'aj qe' txolyol. Tu'n tok q'ot txkantl, q'on ku'xe "qe techil Unicode" tzalu'. Jun yek'b'itz, te tailandés, q'o'n ku'xe/U0020 tu'n t-xi' tma'n te Bloom qa tuj yol tailandés nchi ajb'en qe' jun tenb'il tza'n tten tu'n tku'x b'aj qe' jun txolyol.

alt-trans.target: Tzqi'n maj tu'n Bloom q'amanjs ju'njun techil najb'en tujqe twitz yol te' twitz tx'otx' tu'n tok techil jatuma nponb'aj qe txol yol. Tu'n tok q'ot txkantl, q'on ku'xe "qe techil Unicode" tzalu'. Jun yek'b'itz, te tailandés, q'o'n ku'xe/U0020 tu'n txi' tma'n te Bloom qa tuj yolb'il tailandés nchajb'en qe ju'n tenb'il tza'n tenyinx tu'n tkux b'aj qe jun txolil yol.

trans-unit.source: Bloom Enterprise adds features and services that are important for publishers, governments, and international organizations. This paid subscription meets their unique needs while supporting the development and user support of Bloom for the community at large.
trans-unit.target: Aju Bloom Empresarial in o'k tq'o'n taq'unb'il ex qe' ajb'el nim t-xilen kye qe' t-ximb'il aq'untl, te wi'xin, qe' chemb'il te tkyaqil twitz tx'otx' ex txqantl. Alkyeqe' ku'x kyb'i ex o chjet kyu'n, ntzaj tq'o'n alkyexix tajb'il, tajlal in onin tu'n tch'iy Bloom te kyaqil k'loj xjal in ajb'en kyu'n.

alt-trans.target: Bloom Empresarial no'k tq'o'n taq'nab'il ex qe ajb'el nim txilen kye qe t-ximb'il aq'untl, te wi'xin, qe chemb'il te kyaqil twitz tx'otx' ex txqantl. Alkyeqe ku'x kyb'i ex o chjet kyu'n, ntzaj tq'o'n alkyexix tajb'il, tajlal n-onin tu'n tch'iy Bloom te kyaqil k'loj xjal n-najb'en kyu'n.
